mapper.sql: id, price, create_time, create_user_id, village_code, sts
mapper.select: select id, price, create_time, create_user_id, village_code, case sts when '0' then '删除' when '1' then '启用' else '停用' end as sts from st_applet_parking_price where village_code = #{villageCode}
mapper.insert:
insert into st_applet_parking_price
id,
price,
create_time,
create_user_id,
village_code,
sts,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{villageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update st_applet_parking_price
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
village_code = #{villageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sts = #{sts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update st_applet_parking_price set price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, village_code = #{villageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sts = #{sts,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
